'''Golden Finch''' is a type of finch which can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Golden finches can be found north of [[Guili Plains]] teleporter and north of [[Cuijue Slope]] teleporter, on a wooden bridge west of the teleporter:
